pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru
noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru
noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru
noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

lessons.japanese: あいつなら、ちゃんと約束を守るよ。
lessons.indonesian: You can trust him to keep his word.

lessons.japanese: お前の年なら、もっとちゃんとできるよな。
lessons.indonesian: You ought to know better at your age.

lessons.japanese: やるからには、ちゃんとやりなさい。
lessons.indonesian: If you do it at all, do it well.

lessons.japanese: もうあんたも大学生なんだから、ちゃんとしなさいよ。
lessons.indonesian: Now that you are a college student, you should know better.

lessons.japanese: ぼんやりしていなければ、君もちゃんとできるよ。
lessons.indonesian: If you didn't have your head in the clouds, you could succeed.

lessons.japanese: ポンプはちゃんと動かなかった。
lessons.indonesian: The pump did not act as it should have.

lessons.japanese: ちゃんと朝ご飯を食べて行きなさい。
lessons.indonesian: You should eat something before you go.

lessons.japanese: ちゃんと消化されるように、食べ物はしっかりとかみなさい。
lessons.indonesian: Chew your food well so it can be digested properly.

lessons.japanese: ちゃんとしたブリッジは１か月後に入ります。
lessons.indonesian: I need one month to make a permanent bridge for you.
